attributes.comment:
The USCIS needs to first disclose what it has done internally to clean
up/merge/elimnate reduant function and cost savings achieved. Steep increase in fees
is not the way to cover your costs. If private industry can eliminate postions and
consolidate with existing resources, that is what you need to do first before any kind of
tax increase. Justifying that you have done everything possible without cost increase is
what USCIS needs to do first to let public know before embarking on other intitiative
that would not be possible without price increase.

Also as this involves post 9/11 effort, Federal Govt needs to pitch in with its share of
resposibilites of funding as the dynamics of previous laws have considerably changed
according to the document.

Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
